casebody.data:
POLHEMUS v. POLHEMUS et al. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. July 24, 1906.) Appeal from Special Term, Kings County. Action by Elsa C. Polhemus against Horace G. Polhemus and others. From an adverse judgment, defendants appeal. Dismissed.

Argued before HIRSCHBERG, P. J., and WOODWARD, JENKS, RICH, and MILDER, JJ.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed, without costs. See Polhemus v. Polhemus (decided herewith) 100 N. Y. Supp. 263.
